name: react-animated-text-loop
description: react-animated-text-loop is a lightweight npm package for React that enables you to add dynamic, looping animated text to your web applications. With customizable options for font size, background, text color, animation speed, and more, you can easily create attention-grabbing text animations that will engage your users. Whether you need to showcase important messages, highlight key features, or simply add some visual interest to your page, react-animated-text-loop has got you covered.
author: SHETER
